item.title: F.A.Q
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" desctop_mb="margin-lg-120b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-80b" mobile_mb="margin-xs-60b"][vc_column][pixxy_banner style_banner="elementary" light="yes" animation="yes" title="f.a.q" image="1345"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-70b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-60b"][vc_column][pixxy_content_block style="faq" subtitle="01." title="branding is simply a more efficient way to sell things?" text="The buying of large-screen TVs has absolutely skyrocketed lately. It seems that everyone wants one – and with good reason. The large-screen TV has come a long way from those faded-out behemoths of old that took up half your living room and never really produced a picture of decent quality. Now, however, especially in combination with HDTV, you can get not only a nice, large picture, but a crisp, clean one too."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-35b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-50b"][vc_column][vc_separator color="custom" style="dashed" border_width="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-80b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-60b"][vc_column][pixxy_content_block style="faq" subtitle="02." title="it’s better to be first in the mind than to be first in the marketplace?" text="Large businesses require a lot of IT infrastructure and a department to look after it. Small businesses often can’t afford to have that sort of internal support in place, yet they need fully operational IT systems in order for the business to run properly. For businesses like these, external IT support can be a cost-effective yet vital resource."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-35b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-50b"][vc_column][vc_separator color="custom" style="dashed" border_width="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-80b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-60b"][vc_column][pixxy_content_block style="faq" subtitle="03." title="positioning is what you do to the mind of the prospect?" text="Recently, the US Federal government banned online casinos from operating in America by making it illegal to transfer money to them through any US bank or payment system. As a result of this law, most of the popular online casino networks such as Party Gaming and PlayTech left the United States. Overnight, online casino players found themselves being chased by the Federal government. "][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-35b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-50b"][vc_column][vc_separator color="custom" style="dashed" border_width="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mb="margin-lg-120b" desctop_md_mb="margin-md-80b" mobile_mb="margin-xs-60b"][vc_column][pixxy_content_block style="faq" subtitle="04." title="branding is simply a more efficient way to sell things?" text="Many of us are so used to working on a computer desktop that when it comes time to purchase a new computer, we don’t consider other options. Today, computer notebooks – which were once called laptops – offer a number of advantages over a computer desktop. Here are just five reasons why you should take a second look at notebooks."][/vc_column][/vc_row]
